SELECT i.inquiry_id, u.user_code, u.user_name, i.inquiry_title, i.publish_status, i.inquiry_viewcount, i.created_date, i.updated_date, i.inquiry_secret_yn, i.inquiry_reply_yn FROM inquiry i LEFT JOIN user_info u USING(user_code) LEFT JOIN user_role ur ON u.user_role_id = ur.user_role_id WHERE 1 = 1
AND (i.inquiry_secret_yn = 'N' OR (i.inquiry_secret_yn = 'Y' AND i.user_code = #{userCode}))
and i.inquiry_title like CONCAT('%', #{inquiryTitle}, '%')
and i.publish_status = #{publishStatus}
ORDER BY
i.inquiry_viewcount
i.inquiry_title
i.created_date
ASC
DESC
LIMIT #{offset}, #{count}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inquiry i LEFT JOIN user_info u USING(user_code) WHERE 1 = 1
and i.inquiry_title like CONCAT('%', #{inquiryTitle}, '%')
and i.publish_status = #{publishStatus}
ORDER BY
i.inquiry_viewcount
i.inquiry_title
i.created_date
ASC
DESC
